casebody.data:
IRONSHORE INDEMNITY, INC., etc., Appellant,
v.
W & W GLASS, LLC, et al., Respondents. The Related Companies, L.P., et al., Nonparty Respondents. Motion No: 2017-1149 Court of Appeals of New York. Decided on January 11, 2018

Motion for leave to appeal denied with one hundred dollars costs and necessary reproduction disbursements.
